elements.name: User is on the login page.

steps.name: user is on the login page

elements.name: US249_TC01 User should be able to attach a link to the specified text.

steps.name: user enters "hr" and "17" to log in
user clicks the activity stream button
user lands on the activity stream page
user clicks the message box
user clicks the link button
user enters "Volvo" in the link text field
user enters "www.volvo.com" in the Link URL field
user clicks the Save button
user should see the "Volvo" link attached in the message input field.
